trend_summary: 2000-2023 imagery shows a compact CBD surrounded by parks. Vacant lots and low-rise blocks are steadily replaced by denser mixed-use buildings, especially along the main north-south avenue. Transport capacity rises with a widened freeway and new light-rail/road corridor, while airport infrastructure grows. Simultaneously, riverside green space is rehabilitated, adding canopy and wetlands.
notable_changes: Progressive infill of vacant parcels within the central grid, raising building coverage and height.
Widening of the primary northâ€“south freeway and addition of new overpasses/interchanges.
Light-rail or dedicated transit corridor introduced parallel to the freeway.
Extension and resurfacing of the eastern runway with larger apron and hangar areas.
Expansion of riverside parks and wetlands, increasing visible tree canopy.
